comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: It's captioned one word, "Lilianfels" Site of the mountain retreat of the Darley family. Sir Frederick Darley was the sixth Chief Justice of New South Wales. Named after one of his daughters, Lilian. Fels means a high rocky ground Presently the location of an upscale hotel: www.lilianfels.com.au/web/okat/okat_c3a_introduction.jsp Biography of Sir Frederick here, where it is mentioned he 'rusticated' at Lilianfels, Katoomba: www.adb.online.anu.edu.au/biogs/A040019b.htm
